sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { NgForm } from '@angular/forms'; import { MovieService } from '../services/movie.service'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-movie-create', templateUrl: './movie-create.component.html', styleUrls: ['./movie-create.component.css'] }) export class MovieCreateComponent { constructor(private movieService: MovieService, private router: Router) { } submitHandler(form: NgForm) { if (form.invalid) { return; } const { title, director, year, genre, imageUrl, plot } = form.value; this.movieService.createMovie( title, director, year, genre, imageUrl, plot ).subscribe(()=>{ this.router.navigate(["dashboard"]); }) } }

Create Movie

Title is required!
Director is required!
Year is required!
First movie was made in 1888. Please enter valid year!
Genre is required!
Image URL is required!
Image URL must start with http:// or https://!
Plot is required!
Plot must be more than 10 characters!
